plugins.name: Security.txt downloader
plugins.description: Downloads the security.txt file from the target host.

plugins.name: WebpageAnalysis
plugins.description: Downloads a resource and uses several different normalizers to analyze

plugins.name: RPKI
plugins.description: Check if an IPv4 or IPv6 address has a valid VRPS record.

plugins.name: Nmap TCP
plugins.description: Defaults to top 250 TCP ports. Includes service detection.

plugins.name: DnsRecords
plugins.description: Fetch the DNS record(s) of a hostname

plugins.name: Testssl.sh Ciphers
plugins.description: Run testssl.sh Docker container and check ciphers

plugins.name: masscan
plugins.description: Quickly scan large amounts of IPs.

plugins.name: Nmap IP range
plugins.description: Scan an IP range and store found IPs. Defaults to top-250 TCP and top-10 UDP on ranges with 1024 addresses or less. Larger ranges are skipped by default.

plugins.name: Shodan
plugins.description: Use Shodan to find open ports with vulnerabilities that are found on that port

plugins.name: Nmap UDP
plugins.description: Defaults to top 250 UDP ports. Includes service detection.

plugins.name: Nmap Ports
plugins.description: Scan a specific set of ports including service detection

report_types.name: IPv6 Report
report_types.description: Check whether hostnames point to IPv6 addresses.

report_types.name: Mail Report
report_types.description: System specific Mail Report that focusses on IP addresses and hostnames.

report_types.name: Name Server Report
report_types.description: Name Server Report checks name servers on basic security standards.

report_types.name: Open Ports Report
report_types.description: Find open ports of IP addresses

report_types.name: RPKI Report
report_types.description: Shows whether the IP is covered by a valid RPKI ROA. For a hostname it shows the IP addresses and whether they are covered by a valid RPKI ROA.

report_types.name: Safe Connections Report
report_types.description: Shows whether the IPService contains safe ciphers.

report_types.name: System Report
report_types.description: Combine IP addresses, hostnames and services into systems.

report_types.name: Vulnerability Report
report_types.description: Vulnerabilities found are grouped for each system.

report_types.name: Web System Report
report_types.description: Web System Reports check web systems on basic security standards.
